go_data.justification: IKKepsilon is involved in the TBK1/IKKepsilon-dependent pathway, indicating its role as a kinase.
IKKepsilon is involved in signaling pathways, which typically occur in the cytoplasm.
IKKepsilon is involved in the activation of IRF7, which is a key component of the innate immune response.
IKKepsilon is part of the TBK1/IKKepsilon-dependent pathway, which is a signaling pathway.
